item_prototype.name: Contrail Control BGP Peer status for $1

trigger_prototype.name: BGP Peer {#CONTROLLER_IP} connection is not established
trigger_prototype.description: BGP Peer $1 connection status is not "Established" in introspect page http://localhost:8083/Snh_ShowBgpNeighborSummaryReq

item.name: Contrail Schema Status
item.description:
Check if schema transformer status is active or passive, or failed
0 - Failed 1 - Active 2 - Passive

item.name: Contrail Vrouter XMPP Config controller status
Contrail Vrouter XMPP Multicast controller status

item_prototype.name: Contrail Vrouter XMPP Config controller status for $2
Contrail Vrouter XMPP Multicast controller status for $2

template.name: Template Contrail Controller Apps
template.description: Placeholder for all contrail controller node templates

trigger.name: Contrail-alarm-gen is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 8086 of contrail-collector

trigger.name: Contrail-alarm-gen status Failure
trigger.description: Contrail-alarm-gen status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-analytics-api is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 8081 of contrail-analytics-api

trigger.name: Contrail-analytics-api status Failed
trigger.description: Contrail-analytics-api status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-api is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 9100 of contrail-api

trigger.name: Contrail-collector is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 8086 of contrail-collector

trigger.name: Contrail-collector status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-collector status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-control is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 8083 of contrail-control

trigger.name: Contrail-control status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-control status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-discovery is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 9110 of contrail-discovery

trigger.name: Contrail-discovery status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-discovery status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-dns is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 8093 of contrail-dns

trigger.name: Contrail-dns status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-dns status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-schema is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 8087 of contrail-schema

trigger.name: Contrail-schema master switchover happend
trigger.description:
Contrail-schema master switchover happend.
Dependent on contrail-schema status failed, so in case of a failure, this alert will not be triggered.

trigger.name: Contrail-schema status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-schema status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-svc-monitor is Down
trigger.description: Cannot connect to port 8088 of contrail-svc-monitor

trigger.name: Contrail-svc-monitor master switchover happend
trigger.description:
Contrail-svc-monitor master switchover happend.
Dependent on contrail-svc-monitor status failed, so in case of a failure, this alert will not be triggered.

trigger.name: Contrail-svc-monitor status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-svc-monitor status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail-vrouter-agent is Down
trigger.description: Contrail-vrouter-agent introspect port (8085) is not accessible

trigger.name: Contrail-vrouter-gen status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-vrouter-agent status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail config api status Failure
trigger.description: contrail-api status failed in nodestatus (Snh_SandeshUVECacheReq?x=NodeStatus)

trigger.name: Contrail Vrouter XMPP Config controller is Not Active
trigger.description: None of the XMPP config controllers are Active in Vrouter introspect url http://localhost:8085/Snh_AgentXmppConnectionStatusReq

trigger.name: Contrail Vrouter XMPP Multicast controller is Not Active
trigger.description: None of the XMPP Multicast controllers are Active in Vrouter introspect url http://localhost:8085/Snh_AgentXmppConnectionStatusReq
